ServiceResourceDataTranslation.name: ServiceResourceDataTranslation
ServiceResourceDataTranslation.description: Represents the translated values of the data stored within a ServiceResource record’s fields.

Description.description: The translated value for the ServiceResource description.

IsOutOfDate.description: Indicates whether the translation is out-of-date (true) or current (false). A translation is out-of-date if the parent ServiceResource record is updated after the last translation was filed.

Language.description: The language for these translated values.

Name.description: The translated value for the ServiceResource record name. This field is required to translate the text in other fields.

ParentId.description: The record ID of the ServiceResource associated with the data that is being translated.

ServiceResourceDataTranslation.accessRules: Your organization must be using Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, or Developer edition. Translation Workbench and data translation must be enabled in your org. To view this object, you must have the “View Setup and Configuration” permission
